docs.text: Welcome to MSTP Codes This is a website to share information and resources about mcw mstp. We are currently taking suggestions for pages and information that you would like be made available. Warning This site is currently under construction and is just for demo purposes This site was built using mkdocs and uses the material theme. Layout I was thinking that the primary pages could run accross the header. Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome
